title: My pixel will connect via Bluetooth to my car, but plays only media and no phone calls
content: When I go to Bluetooth setting and select my vehicle, it only allows me to turn on "media" and "contact sharing" while I have no option for phone calls. My car is capable of doing Bluetooth calls as I have previously done this with older phones.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
